vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to thrust, push, drive, cast away, cast out, expel, thrust away
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to thrust, push
1a2) to drive out, thrust out
1a3) to depose
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 擠, 推, 驅使
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 用力推, 推動
1a2) 驅走, 趕走
1a3) 罷免 (賽22:19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 挤, 推, 驱使
1a) (Qal)
1a1) 用力推, 推动
1a2) 驱走, 赶走
1a3) 罢免 (赛22:19)
